23a5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu sems can gang yang rung ba zhig /bdag por 'gyur ba'i las kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyis sems can gyis sems can dmyal ba rnams na gshin rje'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams ni sprul pa
23a6(mdo 'grel): lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod pa dang gnod byed lcags zangs la sogs pa rnams dang/ sems can dmyal ba'i me yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu las kyis ji ltar 'gro ba bzhin du sems can de dag de dang/ de las gzhan pa'i 'gro bdag tu skye bar 'gyur ro
23a7(mdo 'grel): de lta bu'i tshul gyis gling bzhi pa ther 'bum dang/ ri rab ther 'bum dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha ris drug po ther 'bum dang/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten ther 'bum gyi stong gsum pa ni cig char 'chags la cig char 'jig go /de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa gsum
23b1(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ zla ba stong dang nyi ma stong dang/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong gi bar du gcig tu bsdus pa ni stong chung ngu'o/ /chung ngu de stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'o/ /bar ma de stong la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste/ de lta bur
23b2(mdo 'grel): shar phyogs dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ steng dang 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'chags pa la mdza' med mu med do/ /'di lta ste/ char pa gshol mnga' tsam 'bab pa na chu'i rgyun la rgyun 'chad med cing bar mtshams med par 'bab pa de
23b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du phyogs gzhan thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jig pa dang/ 'chags pa la mdza' med mu med do/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig ces bya ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa byung nas
23b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnams mdzad do/ /de ltar 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang/ dud 'gro rnams dang/ yi dags rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ mi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ skye gnas
23b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa sgo nga las skye ba dang/ mngal las skye ba dang/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skye ba dang/ gzhi drug dang/ dus rnam pa bcu ste/ dus tshigs dang/ lo dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ nyin mo dang/ mtshan mo dang/ skad cig dang/ de'i skad cig dang/
23b6(mdo 'grel): thang cig dang yud tsam dang/ yongs su bzung ba'i dngos po bdun dang/ lus kyi yo byad bcu dang/ 'dod pa la longs spyod pa bcu ste/ de dag kyang lung bar ma las 'byung ba bzhin no/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su spyad pa rnam pa brgyad dang/ 'jig rten
23b7(mdo 'grel): gyi chos brgyad de rnyed pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang/ snyan pa dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ smad pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ phyogs gsum ste/ mdza' bshes kyi phyogs dang/ mi mdza' pa'i phyogs dang/ tha mal ba'i phyogs dang/ 'jig rten
24a1(mdo 'grel): gyi spyod pa gsum dang/ gtam rnam pa gsum dang/ nyes rtsom rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang/ sems can gyi ris drug cu rtsa bzhi dang/ dus brgyad dang/ mngal du 'jug pa bzhi dang/ spyod lam bzhi dang/ 'tsho ba rnam pa drug dang/ kun nas bsrung ba rnam
24a2(mdo 'grel): pa drug dang/ sdug bsngal rnam pa bdun dang/ nga rgyal rnam pa bdun dang/ rgyags pa rnam pa bdun dang/ tha snyad bzhi dang/ tha snyad kyi gzhi mang po rnams 'byung ngo/ /de la sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/ sems can dmyal ba'i phung po sa bon dang/ 'bras bus bsdus pa
24a3(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa'o/ /sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin du dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang/ yi dags kyi 'gro ba dang/ lha'i 'gro ba dang/ mi'i 'gro ba yang de dang 'dra ste/ ci rigs par blta bar bya'o/ /sgo nga las skyes pa'i
24a4(mdo 'grel): skye gnas gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag sgo pa'i spubs mngon par brtol nas 'byung ba rnams yin te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ ne tsho dang ri skegs la sogs pa'o/ /mnga' nas skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhen sems can gang dag shams kun nas yogs
24a5(mdo 'grel): shing sha ma brtol nas 'gyur ba rnams te/ de dag yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ ba lang dang/ bong bu la sogs pa'o/ /drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag drod gsher gang yang rung ba las brten nas skye ba rnams te/ de dag
24a6(mdo 'grel): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srin bu dang/ grog spur dang/ phye ma leb dang/ shing srin rnams so/ /rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag las kyi dbang gis skye mched drug tshang ba 'am/ skye mched drug las gang yang rung ba rnams skye ba rnams te/ de dag
24a7(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ bdud 'gro dang/ yi dags dang/ mi rnams las kha cig go /gzhi drug gang zhe na/ gnas pa'i gzhi 'di lta ste/ 'og gi rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang/ chu'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sa'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhi dang po ste/
24b1(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams thur du mi ltung ba'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o/ /gnas ni gzhi gnyis pa ste/ de yang khang khyim dang/ yang thog la sogs pa ste/ de ni 'dzag gnod byed rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o/ /khang khyim dang yang
24b2(mdo 'grel): thog la sogs pa de dag kyang mdor bsdu na ched du byas pa dang/ ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ sprul ba rnams so/ /lo legs pa ni gzhi gsum pa ste/ de ni kham gyi zas kyi rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o/ /bde pa ni gzhi bzhi pa ste/ de ni sems can
24b3(mdo 'grel): rnams mtshon cha la sogs pas ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba ni gzhi lnga pa ste/ de ni gzugs rnams snang ba'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o/ /zas ni gzhi drug pa ste/ de dag kyang zas rnam pa bzhi ste/ kham gyi zas dang/ reg pa'i
24b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ yid la sems pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i zas te/ de ni lus gnas par byed pa dang/ rton par byed pa'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o/ /yongs su bzung ba'i dngos po bdun gang zhe na/ bdag dang/ pha ma dang/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran dang bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang
24b5(mdo 'grel): zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ nye du dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dang/ zhing gi dngos po dang/ khyim gyi dngos po dang/ zod dgram? pa'i dngos po dang/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ las kyi mdza' la sbyor ba'i dngos po rnams dang/ nor sogs pa'i dngos po dang bdun no//
24b6(mdo 'grel): yo byad bcu gang zhe na/ zas dang/ skom dang/ bzhon pa dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ bzhad gang dang/ glu bro dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ spos dang/ me tog phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ snod spyad dang/ snang ba dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dga' dgur spyod pa rnams so/ /rgyun mi 'chad bar rjes su sbyad pa brgyad
24b7(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ 'jig rten dag rgyun mi 'chad par na rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ pa char gyis dkri ba dang/ lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ spyod lam gzhan la yongs su brtag pa dang/ kha zas bza' ba dang/ gnyid log pa dang/ 'khrig pa dang de dang ldan pa'i brtsal ba dang/ de dang ldan pa'i
25a1(mdo 'grel): gtam rnams so/ /'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ smra ba dang/ gtam byed pa dang/ so sor mgu bar byed pa dang/ bag ma gtong ba dang/ bag ma len pa dang/ 'bod pa dang g.yar 'dren pa dang/ lhag par za ba dang/ 'dus shing za ba rnams
25a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ rtsod pa byung ba rnams la gcig gis gcig gi grogs bya ba rnams so/ /gtam rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ chos dang ldan pa dang/ chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang/ de las gzhan pa ste/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gang zhe na/ 'phags pa yo byad bsnyungs pa can dang ldan pa dang/
25a3(mdo 'grel): sems kyi sgrib pa bsal bar 'gyur ba'i gtam bya ba gang yin pa ste/ rgyas par mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/ /chos dang mi ldan pa gang zhe na/ gang nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can gyis kha zas la sogs pa'i gtam byed pa'o/ /lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis
25a4(mdo 'grel): byas pa rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i gtam zhes bya'o// //bam po gsum pa/ nyes chos rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhal blugs la sgyu byed pa dang can? srang la sgyu byed pa dang/ gzhal ba la sgyu byed pa dang/ log pa'i las la sbyor ba dang/
25a5(mdo 'grel): 'thab pa dang/ mtshang 'dru ba dang/ rtsod? pa ba dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ gshe ba dang/ khro ba dang/ dam 'cha' ba dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ rdeg pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ 'chid ba dang/ go rar 'jug pa dang/ gcod pa dang/ spyugs pa dang/ g.yo byed pa dang/ 'drid pa dang/ drag shul
25a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ rdzun zer ba rnams so/ /sems can gyi ris drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ dud 'gro rnams dang/ yi dags rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ mi rnams dang/ rgyal rigs rnams dang/ bram ze rnams dang/ rje'u rigs rnams dang/ dmangs rigs rnams dang/ skyes
25a7(mdo 'grel): pa rnams dang/ bud med rnams dang/ ma ning rnams dang/ ngan pa rnams dang/ 'bring rnams dang/ bzang po rnams dang/ khyim pa rnams dang/ rab tu byung ba rnams dang/ dka' thub drag po can rnams dang/ dka' thub drag po can ma yin pa rnams dang/ sdom pa can rnams dang/
25b1(mdo 'grel): sdom pa can yang ma yin sdom pa can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa rnams dang/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang/ ma nges pa nyid du nges pa
25b2(mdo 'grel): phung po rnams dang/ dge slong rnams dang/ dge slong ma rnams dang/ dge slong ma rnams dang/ dge tshul rnams dang/ dge tshul ma rnams dang/ dge bsnyen rnams dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams dang/ spong ba pa rnams dang/ kha ton pa rnams dang/ zhal ta byed pa rnams dang/ gnas
25b3(mdo 'grel): brten rnams dang/ bar ma rnams dang/ gsar bu rnams dang/ slob dpon rnams dang/ mkhan po rnams dang/ lhan cig gnas pa rnams dang/ nye gnas rnams dang/ blo bur du ltags pa rnams dang/ dge 'dun gyi las byed pa rnams dang/ rnyed pa 'dod pa rnams dang/ bkur sti 'dod pa
25b4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang/ mang du thos pa rnams dang/ mkhas shing bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams dang/ mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang/ 'dul pa 'dzin pa rnams dang/ ma mo 'dzin pa rnams dang/ so so'i skye
25b5(mdo 'grel): bo rnams dang/ bden pa mthong ba rnams dang/ slob pa rnams dang/ mi slob pa rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams so/ /'khor los sgyur ba de dag kyang/ gling
25b6(mdo 'grel): gcig la dbang ba rnams dang/ gling gnyis la dbang ba rnams dang/ gling gsum la dbang ba rnams dang/ gling bzhi la dbang ba rnams te/ de la gling gcig la dbang ba la ni lcags kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gling gnyis la dbang ba la ni zangs kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
25b7(mdo 'grel): gling gsum la dbang ba la ni dngul gyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gling bzhi pa la dbang ba la ni gser gyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rtsas? brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mngal na gnas pa'i dus dang/ byis pa'i dus dang/ gzhon nu'i dus dang/ lang tsho'i dus dang/ dar la? bab?
26a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i dus dang/ rgas pa'i dus dang/ 'khogs pa'i dus so/ /de la mngal na gnas pa'i dus ni mer mer po la sogs pa'o/ /btsas pa'i dus ni de yan chad dang/ 'khogs pa'i dus man cad do/ /byis pa'i dus ni 'gro ba dang rtse mi nus pa man cad do/ /gzhon
26a2(mdo 'grel): nu'i dus ni de nus pa yin no/ /lang tsho'i dus ni 'dod pa spyod nus pa nas lo sum cu man cad do/ /dar la bab pa'i dus ni lo lnga bcu man cad do/ /rgas pa'i dus ni lo bdun cu man cad do/ /de yan cad ni 'khogs pa'i dus so/ /mngal du 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
26a3(mdo 'grel): shes bzhin du 'jug la mi shes par gnas shing 'byung ba dang/ shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la mi shes par 'byung ba dang/ shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas te 'byung ba dang/ mi shes par 'jug cing gnas te 'byung ba'o/ /de la dang po ni 'khor los
26a4(mdo 'grel): sgyur ba'i'o/ /gnyis pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi'o/ /gsum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' i'o/ /bzhi pa ni de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams so/ /'tsho ba rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhing rmo ba dang/ tshong bya ba dang/ phyugs ba so ba dang/ rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho
26a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ yi ge dang/ grangs dang/ shong rgod pa dang/ rtsis dang/ lag rtsis dang/ de las gzhan pa'i bzo'i gnas rnams so/ /kun nas srung ba rnam pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rta pa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung
26a6(mdo 'grel): gi tshogs dang/ nor gyi stobs dang/ mdza' bshes kyi stobs so/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba dang/ 'dod pas 'phongs pa rnams so/ /nga rgyal rnam pa bdun gang
26a7(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ nga rgyal dang/ che ba'i nga rgyal dang/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang/ log pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /rgyags pa rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ nad med pas rgyags pa dang/ lang tshos rgyags
26b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gson pas rgyags pa dang/ rigs kyis rgyags pa dang/ gzugs kyis rgyags pa dang/ dbang phyug gis rgyags pa dang/ thos pas rgyags pa'o/ /tha snyad bzhi gang zhe na/ mthong ba'i tha snyad dang/ thos pa'i tha snyad dang/ bye brag phyed pa'i tha snyad dang/ rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad do//
26b2(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i tha snyad gang zhe na/ gang nges mig gi phyi rol mngon sum du byas nas de la brten te/ gzhan dag la tha snyad du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i tha snyad ces bya'o/ /thos pa'i tha snyad gang zhe na/ gang gzhan las thos nas de la brten te/ gzhan dag la tha snyad du brjod pa
26b3(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa'o/ /bye brag phyed pa'i tha snyad gang zhe na/ gang de ma mthong ma thos par bdag nyid kyis bsams shing btsal la nye bar brtags nas/ de la brten te/ gzhan dag la tha snyad du brjod pa gang yin pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad gang zhe na/ gang des nang so sor
26b4(mdo 'grel): rang gis rig pa dang/ rtogs pa dang/ reg pa dang/ mngon sum du byas nas de la brten te/ gzhan dag la tha snyad du brjod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad ces bya'o/ /tha snyad kyi gzhi mang po dag gang zhe na/ de dag ni nges pa'i tshig gi gzhi rnams zhes
26b5(mdo 'grel): kyang bya/ spros pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ don bsdus pa'i gzhi rnams zhes kyang bya ste/ rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o/ /de dag ni yi ge'i phyi mo'i yi ge rnams kyi don thams cad sdud par rig par bya ste/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ sa dang/ dbang po dang/ yul dang/ chos dang/ gang
26b6(mdo 'grel): zag dang/ ngo bo nyid dang/ bye brag rnams dang/ bya ba dang bdag dang/ gzhan dang/ dngos po dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ dri ba dang/ lan glan pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ blang ba dang/ yang dag pa nyid dang/ log pa nyid rnams dang/ gnang ba dang bkag pa dang/ yon tan dang/ skyon dang/ rnyed
26b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang/ snyan pa dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ smad pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ snying po dang/ mchog dang/ shes pa dang/ zhum pa dang/ sgyid lug pa dang/ de tsam dang/ grogs la yang dag par bstan pa dang/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
27a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba rnams dang/ brjod pa'i tshig bdun la de dag kyang rnam par dbye ba bdun po rnams yin te/ skyes pas skyes pa la/ skyes pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ gdags
27a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gdags su med pa dang/ brda sprod pa dang/ nges par sems pa dang/ rnam par rig par byed pa dang/ gnas pa dang/ gzhag pa dang/ 'dus pa dang/ bsags pa dang/ nges pa dang/ bsgo ba dang/ ya mtshan dang/ thog ma dang/ bar ma dang/ tha ma rnams dang/ rigs kyi
27a3(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang/ dam bca' ba dang/ tha snyad dang/ nan tan dang/ longs spyad pa dang/ brtsal ba dang/ kun nas bsrung ba dang/ 'dzem pa dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ bzod pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ so sor rtog pa rnams dang/ pha dang ma dang/ bu la sogs pa yongs su
27a4(mdo 'grel): bzung ba dang/ yo byad thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o/ /skye ba dang/ rga ba nas 'dod pas phongs pa'i bar dang/ mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang/ lang tsho dang/ nad med pa dang/ gson pa dang/ sdug pa dang phrad pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang bral ba dang/ 'dod pa 'byor
27a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rgud pa dang/ sngon du 'ong ba dang/ phyir 'gro ba dang/ mdun du blta ba dang/ g.yas g.yos su blta ba dang/ bskum pa dang/ brkyang pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dang/ mi nyal ba dang/ smra ba dang/ mi smra ba dang/ gnyid dang/ snyom pa
27a6(mdo 'grel): bsang ba rnams dang/ zos pa dang/ 'thungs pa dang/ 'chos pa dang/ myangs pa dang/ goms pa dang/ ma goms pa dang/ bag med pa dang/ bag yod pa rnams dang/ bsdu ba dang/ spro ba dang/ 'grib pa dang/ 'phel ba dang/ rtag pa dang/ dpyod
27a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ spros pa dang/ spros pa med pa rnams dang/ nyams stobs dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ bsgrub? pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ 'jug pa dang/ so sor nges pa dang/ 'byor 'brel dang/ mgyogs pa dang/ go rim dang/ dus dang/
27b1(mdo 'grel): yul dang/ grangs dang/ tshogs pa dang/ ma tshogs pa dang 'dra ba dang/ mi 'dra ba rnams dang/ 'dres pa dang/ thun mong dang/ mngon sum dang/ lkog dang bsgribs pa bsgrags pa rnams dang/ dgos pa dang/ rgyu dang/ 'dul ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang/
27b2(mdo 'grel): yo byad dang/ bden pa dang/ brdzun pa dang/ phan pa dang/ mi phan pa dang/ gnas dang/ dog pa dang/ ltad mo rnams dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa yin pa dang/ gsal ba dang/ mi gsal ba dang/ bsad pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ go rar gzhug pa dang/ gcod
27b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ spyugs pa rnams dang/ gshe ba dang/ khro ba dang/ rdegs pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ dam 'cha' ba dang/ bsreg pa dang/ bsrul ba dang/ bskam pa dang/ btso ba dang/ dril ba dang/ rnyog pa can dang/ yid ches pa'i lung dang/ rjes su dpag pa rnams so/ /ngo bo
27b4(mdo 'grel): nyid la sogs pa las kyi bar gyi rnam pa lnga po de dag ni/ gnas gsum po/ gzugs 'dus pa dang/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs dang/ 'dus ma byas pas sdus par rig par bya ste/ de las gzhan pa btags pa'i yod pa'i chos rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /de la
27b5(mdo 'grel): de zhig gzugs 'dus pa la/ chos thams cad na ma skye ba na/ rang gi sa bon rnams las skye'o/ /ji ltar 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas te/ gzugs skye zhes bya/ de dag la rgyur byas pa'i gzugs rten pa dang/ de dag la gnas pa dang/ de dag gis brtan pa dang/ de dag gis
27b6(mdo 'grel): 'phel bar byas par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi 'byung ba dang/ rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thams cad kyi sa bon rnams ni/ nang gi sems kyi rgyud la gnas pa yin te/ de la ji srid du 'byung ba'i sa bon gyis 'byung ba rnams/ bskyed par ma gyur pa/ de srid du
27b7(mdo 'grel): rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi sa bon yang/ rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bskyed par mi byed de/ 'byung ba rnams skyes nas/ de rgyur byas pa'i gzugs rang gi sa bon nyid las skye ba na/ de rgyur byas nas skyes zhes bya'o/ /de skyes pas mngon du 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na 'byung ba
28a1(mdo 'grel): rnams ni de bskyed pa yin no/ /rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ji lta de ltar de la brten ce na/ 'di ltar rgyur byas pa'i gzugs skyes pa de 'byung ba'i phyogs dang tha dad pa med par gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar de la gnas zhe na/ 'byung ba chen po'i
28a2(mdo 'grel): phan pa dang/ gnod pa dag gis grub pa dang/ bde ba gcig pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar des brten pa yin zhe na/ de yod pa tsam gyis 'jig par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar 'phel bar byas she na/ kha zas sam/ gnyid log pa 'am/ tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa 'am/
28a3(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin la brten na/ de la gnas pa'i phyir zhing 'phel ba dang/ shin tu rgyas par 'gyur te/ de bas na 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rnam pa lnga po ni/ rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /gzugs 'dus
28a4(mdo 'grel): pa la yang rdul phra rab ni rnams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ skye ba na rang gi sa bon las 'dus pa nyid chung ngu 'am/ 'bring ngam chen po skye bar zad kyi/ rdul phra rab rnams kyis 'dus pa bskyed par ni ma yin no/ /rdul phra rab ni blos tshad kyi mdza' yongs su bcad pa las
28a5(mdo 'grel): 'dogs par zad de/ de la 'dus pa yang phyogs dang bcas pa yin la/ rdul phra rab kyang phyogs dang bcas pa yin te/ 'on kyang 'dus pa ni yan lag dang bcas pa yin gyi/ rdul phra rab ni ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdul phra rab nyid yan lag yin la/
28a6(mdo 'grel): de yang 'dus pa nyid la yod kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni rdul phra rab gzhan gyi ma yin te/ de bas na rdul phra rab ni yan lag dang bcas pa ma yin no/ /tha dad pa med pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ phyogs gcig gi tha dad med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang
28a7(mdo 'grel): reg bya dbang po med pa rnams kyi 'byung ba'i rdul phra rab la ni/ dbang po ma gtogs pa rnams dang/ dbang po dang bcas pa la ni/ dbang po dang bcas pa rnams phyogs gcig gi tha dad pa med pa yin no/ /yul gcig pa'i phyir 'dres pa'i tha dad med pa ni 'di lta ste/
28b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i rdul phra rab de nyid las de las gzhan pa'i 'dus pa'i 'byung ba dang/ 'byung ba las gyur pa tha dad pa med de/ gzugs 'dud pa de mdza' dag ni/ rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rdol legs par btags la chu dang sbyar ba lta bur 'dres par gyur pa'i tha dad pa med pa
28b2(mdo 'grel): blta bar bya'i/ til dang/ mon sran sde'u dang/ mon sran gre'u dang/ rgya shug gi 'bru dang/ rgya sran la sogs pa'i phung po lta bu ni ma yin no/ /rgyur byas pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang 'byung ba chen po'i phyogs la gnas pa nyid yin gyi/ 'byung ba chen po'i phyogs dang
28b3(mdo 'grel): tha dad du ni gnas te/ 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis phyogs ji tsam non pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyis kyang de tsam non te/ de'i phyir yang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po la brten pa zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir 'byung ba chen po rnams ni/ 'byung ba chen po
28b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ste/ chen por 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba chen po zhes bya'o/ /gzugs 'dus pa de dag kyang mdor bsdu na/ rdzas rnam pa bcu bzhi yod de/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya rnams dang/ mig
28b5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i dbang po gzugs can lnga ste/ yid kyi spyod yul gyi gzugs nyid ma gtogs so/ /de la dbang po gzugs can gyis bsdus pa'i gzugs 'dus pa thams cad ni ji skad bstan pa'i rdzas thams cad kyi khams dang ldan no/ /dbang po gzugs can
28b6(mdo 'grel): gyis bsdus pa ji lta bar dbang po gzugs can gyi gnas 'byung ba chen pos bsdus pa yang de bzhin no/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'dus pa ni dbang po gzugs can rnams ma gtogs par/ de las gzhan pa'i khams dang ldan no/ /de la mtshan nyid kyis bsdu
28b7(mdo 'grel): pas rdzas bcu bzhi po de dag tu gyur to/ /mtshan nyid kyis bsdu ba de nyid la brten nas/ rdzas kyi rdul phra rab gdags so/ /khams kyis bsdus pa ni/ 'dus pa gang khams ji snyed las byung ba de/ rdzas de nyid kyis bsdus par brjod par bya'o/ /dbyer med pas bsdus
29a1(mdo 'grel): pa ni nang gi 'am/ phyi rol gyi bsdus pa gang la/ mtshan nyid kyis chos ji snyed dmigs pa'i rjes de nyid kyis 'dus pa bsdus par rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar 'dus pa la la ni/ 'byung ba gcig pu dmigs te/ 'di lta ste/ rdo dang/ nor bu dang/
29a2(mdo 'grel): mu tig dang/ bai DUrya dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru la sogs pa dang/ chu mig dang/ mtsho dang/ mtshe'u dang/ chu klung dang/ 'bab chu la sogs pa dang/ me lce dang/ mar me dang/ sgron ma la sogs pa dang/ shar dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi rlung gi
29a3(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor rdul dang bcas pa 'am/ rdul med pa'i rlung la sogs pa la dmigs pa lta bu'o/ /la la la ni gnyis dmigs te/ 'di lta ste/ /tshab brom dang/ shing rlon pa dang/ lo ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rlon pa la sogs pa 'am/ nor bu
29a4(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa bsregs pa lta bu'o/ /la la la ni gsum dmigs te/ 'di lta ste/ shing la sogs pa de dag nyid bsregs sam bskyed pa lta bu'o/ /la la la ni bzhi char dmigs te/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi gzugs 'dus pa lta bu dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
29a5(mdo 'grel): ji skad du/ nang gi so sor rang gi skra la sogs pa ni rlung phyi sa la thug pa'i bar gang yin pa de ni nang gi sa'i khams so/ /gcin la sogs pa ni chu'i khams so/ /gang gis lus 'di kun nas gdungs shing kun du gdungs pa dang/ gang gi shas che bas/ rims kyis
29a6(mdo 'grel): btab po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de ni me'i khams so/ /rlung gyen du rgyu ba la sogs pa ni rlung gi khams so/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ de ltar na gang la gang dmigs pa de ni de'i mtshan nyid kyis yod la gang mi dmigs pa de ni med do/ /sgra ni gzugs 'dus pa thams cad
29a7(mdo 'grel): la khams kyi tshul yod do/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni la la la ni da ltar byung ba'i dmigs pa bskyed pas yod do/ /rlung yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rgyud brtan pa dang/ rgyud mi brtan pa'o/ /de la rgyud brtan pa ni/ 'dus pa de dang de dag na 'khrul 'khor gyis rgyu ba gang yin pa'o//
29b1(mdo 'grel): rgyud mi brtan pa ni dkyil 'khor na rgyu ba dang/ bar snang la rgyu ba'o/ /de la mun pa'i gzugs dang/ snang ba'i gzugs dang/ /khong stong la ni nam mkha' i khams zhes bya'o/ /mun pa'i gzugs de yang/ 'jig rten gyi bar dag gi ni brtan pa'o/ /gzhan dag na yod pa ni mi brtan pa'o/ /de
29b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du snang ba'i gzugs la yang/ lha rnams kyi rang las 'od 'byung ba rnams ni bstan pa'o/ /gzhan na yod pa ni mi brtan pa ste/ snang ba dang mun pa de yang/ kha dog shas che ba'i 'dus pa yin par blta bar bya'o/ /gzugs 'dus pa'i sa bon sems la gnas pa'i mthu dang
29b3(mdo 'grel): de dang 'dra ba'i rkyen yod pa las/ res 'ga' ni 'dus pa chung ngu'i mjug thogs su 'dus pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni 'dus pa chen po'i mjug thogs su 'dus pa chung ngu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang yod de/ des na 'dus pa rnams kyi 'bri ba dang skye ba mngon no/ /sra ba
29b4(mdo 'grel): nyid gang zhe na/ sa'o sra bar gyur pa gang zhe na/ de'i sa bon gang yin pa'o/ /yang sra ba de nyid khams so/ /sra bar gyur ba ni skra la sogs pa 'am/ bong ba la sogs pa'o/ /zin par gyur pa gang zhe na/ zin pa nang gang yin pa'o/ /zin par ma gyur pa gang zhe na/ ma zin pa phyi rol gang
29b5(mdo 'grel): yin pa'o/ /yang sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyis sa bon zin par gyur pa ni/ mtshan nyid zin pa yin no/ /de la bzlog pa zin par gyur pa ma yin pa ni ma yin pa'o/ /yang zin pa ni zin par gyur pa ste/ bdag tu khas len pa'i phyir ro/ /zin pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chu'i khams
29b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par lta bar bya'o/ /de la gzugs 'dus pa thams cad la ni dus thams cad kyi khams yod de/ 'di lta ste/ shing skam po gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin du rdo brdabs pa las me 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin du lcags dang
29b7(mdo 'grel): dngul dang gser la sogs pa me 'jebs pas/ bsregs na rkyang po rkyang por 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du chu shel las chu 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul can gyi sems kyi mos pa'i dbang gis/ sa la sogs pa dang/ gser la sogs pa 'byung bar snang ngo/ /gzugs 'dus pa de yang
30a1(mdo 'grel): rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis 'jug par 'gyur te/ rgyas pa las byung ba dang rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o/ /de la rgyas pa las byung ba ni/ rnam pa gnyis te/ yul la khyab pa'i rgyas pa las byung ba dang/ mtshan nyid rtas par
30a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i rgyas pa las byung ba'o/ /rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ rgyas pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang/ rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba dang/ 'gyur ba'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang/ rang bzhin gyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'o/ /rnam par smin
30a3(mdo 'grel): pa las byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam par smin par skyes pa/ rnam par smin par byung ba dang/ rnam par smin pa las skyes pa/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o/ /gzugs 'dus pa de yang mdor bsdu na/ gnas drug las brten nas 'jug ste/ gzhi'i gnas dang/ rten gyi
30a4(mdo 'grel): gnas dang/ yo byad kyi gnas dang/ dbang po'i rten gyi gnas dang/ dbang po'i gnas dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gnas so/ /de la sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs la/ sems kyang dmigs la/ sems las byung ba lnga bcu rtsa gcig po ji skad smos pa
30a5(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ yid la byed pa la sogs pa nas/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa la thug pa'i bar dag kyang dmigs so/ /sems las byung ba'i chos de dag las/ du zhig pa thams cad pa/ sems can thams cad du/ dus thams cad du/ thams cad 'byung zhe na/ smras pa/ yid la byed pa
30a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa nas sems pa la thug pa yan chad lnga po rnams so/ /du zhig pa thams cad pa/ thams cad du 'byung la/ dus thams cad du ma yin zhing/ thams cad ma yin zhe na/ lnga kho na ste/ 'dun pa nas shes rab la thug pa yan chad do/ /du zhig dge ba kho na yin la/ thams cad du
30a7(mdo 'grel): ma yin mod kyis/ sa thams cad pa yin te/ dus thams cad du ma yin la/ thams cad kyang ma yin zhe na/ dad pa la sogs pa nas/ rnam par mi 'tshe ba la thug pa yan chad do/ /du zhig nyon mongs can kho na yin la/ thams cad du yang ma yin/ sa thams cad pa yang ma yin
30b1(mdo 'grel): dus thams cad du yang ma yin/ thams cad kyang ma yin zhe na/ 'dod chags la sogs pa nas bshes bzhin ma yin pa la thug pa yan chad do/ /du zhig thams cad du 'byung la/ sa thams cad pa ma yin/ dus thams cad du ma yin/ thams cad kyang ma yin zhe na/ 'gyod pa?
30b2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa nas dpyod pa la thug pa yan chad do/ /de la dbang po yang yongs su ma nyams shing/ yum yang snang bar gyur la/ de'i 'og tu de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa nye bar gnas par gyur na/ rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po yongs su ma nyams pa ji lta bu yin
30b3(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ rgyu gnyis kyi te/ sa rung bar ma gyur pa dang/ rtul ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pas so/ /yul snang par gyur pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rten tam/ ngo bo nyid dam/ yul lam/ dus sam/ gsal ba 'am/ mi gsal ba 'am/ dngos po mdza' dag gam phyogs gcig
30b4(mdo 'grel): kyang rung ste/ gal te sgrib pa bzhi po dag gis ma sgribs pa dang/ ma bskal pa yin te/ sgrib g.yog gi sgrib pa dang/ mi snang bar byed pa dang/ zil gyis non pa dang/ mig slu bar byed pas ma bsgribs shing/ yul gyis bskal pa dang/ chung ngus bskal pa gnyis kyis
30b5(mdo 'grel): ma bskal ba'o/ /de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ rnam pa bzhis 'gyur te 'dun pa'i stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ yul gyi stobs dang/ goms pa'i stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dun pa'i stobs kyis ji lta bu zhe na/ gang du rjes
30b6(mdo 'grel): su chags pa der sems shas cher 'jug pa 'byung ba'o/ /dran pa'i stobs kyis ji lta bu zhe na/ gang shin tu mtshan ma bzung ba dang/ shin tu rab tu bkra bar bzung ba der sems shes cher 'jug pa 'byung ba'o/ /yul gyis stobs kyis ji lta bu zhe na/ gang na yul tsher
30b7(mdo 'grel): rags pa 'am/ ches yid du 'ong ba nye bar gnas pa der sems shas cher 'jug pa 'byung ba'o/ /goms pa'i stobs kyis ji lta bu zhe na/ shin du 'dres shing/ shin du yongs su 'dris par gyur pa gang yin la der sems shas cher 'jug pa 'byung ba'o/ /de lta ma yin na da? ni/
31a1(mdo 'grel): ba gcig la rtag tu yid la byed pa rnams gcig bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i skad cig gnyis lhan cig tu 'byung ba yang med la phan tshun gyi mjug thogs su phan tshun 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang med do/ /skad cig gcig la 'byung
31a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po de dag gi mjug thogs su/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu gal te rnam par g.yeng bar 'gyur na ni/ de'i 'og tu rnam par shes pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag las gang yang rung ba zhig 'byung
31a3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rnam par g.yeng bar ma gyur na ni/ de'i 'og tu nges pa zhes bya ba yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshol ba dang/ nges pa de gnyis kyang de la rnam par rtog par byed do/ /de la nyon mongs pa can nam/ dge
31a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos ni rgyu gnyis po rnam par rtog pa dang/ sngon gyi 'phen pas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa la ni rgyu gnyis kas 'byung ngo/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag la ni sngon gyi 'phen pa kho nas 'byung ngo/ /nyon mongs pa can dang/ dge ba'i yid
31a5(mdo 'grel): kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'phen pas/ de ma thag tu mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa la nyon mongs pa can dang/ dge ba'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur gyi rnam par rtog pas ni ma yin te/ de dag ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam
31a6(mdo 'grel): par shes pa rnams ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /gang sems gcig gam/ de'i phyi ma rnam shes bya ba de la/ sems gcig tu ji ltar bzhag ce na/ tha snyad gdags pa'i sems kyi skad cig gis gzhag gi 'jug pa'i skad
31a7(mdo 'grel): cig gis ni ma yin no/ /tha snyad gdags par sems gcig gang zhe na/ tshig gcig la brten nas dngos po gcig la dus ji tsam gyis rnam par rig pa 'byung ba de tsam la sems gcig ces bya'o/ /de dang 'dra bar rgyu bde la yang gcig ces bya'o/ /mi 'dra
31b1(mdo 'grel): ba ni de las gnyis pa zhes bya'o/ /de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtsol ba med cing rnam par g.yeng bar 'gyur ba dang/ dmigs pa ma 'dris pa la ni 'dun pa la sogs pa 'jug pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni nye bar gnas pa las byung ba zhes brjod par bya ste/ 'das pa la
31b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa kho na'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gi mjug thogs su byung ba'i yid tshol ba 'am/ /nges pa ni gal te de'i yul de'i dmigs pa yin na/ da ltar gyi yul can kho na zhes bya'o/ /de la rnam par shes pas ni dngos po mdza' dag gi mtshan nyid rnam par shes par
31b3(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /de nyid rnam par rig par ma gyur pa ni/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ de ni yid la byed pas rnam par shes par byed do/ /de nyid la sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang gnyis ka las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni reg pas rig par byed do//
31b4(mdo 'grel): de nyid la phan pa dang gnod pa dang/ gnyis ka las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni/ tshor bas rig par byed do/ /de nyid la tha snyad kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa ni 'du shes kyis rig par byed do/ /de nyid la yang dag pa dang log pa dang/ gnyi ga las
31b5(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa'i bsgrubs pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni sems pas rig par byed de/ de lta bas na sems las byung ba yid la byed pa la sogs pa nas/ sems pa la thug pa de dag ni sa thams cad pa/ thams cad la dus thams cad du thams cad 'byung
31b6(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la byed pa gang zhe na/ sems kyi 'jug pa'o/ /reg pa gang zhe na/ gsum 'dus pa'o/ /tshor ba gang zhe na/ myong ba'o/ /'du shes gang zhe na/ kun shes pa'o/ /sems pa gang zhe na/ sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o/ /'dun pa gang zhe na/ gang 'dod pa'i
31b7(mdo 'grel): dngos po de dang de la de'i rjes su 'gro zhing byed 'dod pa'o/ /mos pa gang zhe na/ gang nges pa'i dngos po de dang de la de'i rjes su 'gro zhing nges par 'dzin nus pa'o/ /dran pa gang zhe na/ gang 'dris pa'i dngos po de dang de la de'i rjes su 'gro zhing mngon par brjod pa'o/ /ting
32a1(mdo 'grel): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang brtag pa'i dngos po de dang de la de'i rjes su 'gro zhing nges par sems pa la brten nas sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /shes rab gang zhe na/ gang brtag pa'i dngos po nyid de dang de la de'i rjes su 'gro zhing/ chos rnams la rab
32a2(mdo 'grel): tu rnam par 'byed pa ste// //rigs pas bskyed pa 'am/ rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa 'am/ rigs pas bskyed pa yang ma yin/ rig pa ma yin pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa'o/ /de la yid la byed pa las ci byed ce na/ sems
32a3(mdo 'grel): gtong ba'i las byed do/ /reg pa las ci byed ce na/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ sems pa rnams kyi gnas sbyin pa'i las byed do/ /tshor ba las ci byed ce na/ sred pa skye ba dang/ btang snyoms su 'jog pa'i las byed do/ /'du shes las ci byed ce na/ dmigs pa la sems
32a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i tha snyad kyi las byed do/ /sems pa las ci byed ce na/ rtog pa dang/ lus dang ngag gi la sogs pa slong ba'i las byed do/ /'dun pa las ci byed ce na/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa skyed pa'i las byed do/ /mos pa las ci byed ce na/ yon tan nam nyes pa 'am
32a5(mdo 'grel): gnyi ga ma yin pas dmigs pa la dga' bar byed pa'i las byed do/ /dran pa las ci rkyed ce na/ yun ring po nas bsams pa dang/ byas pa dang/ smras pa dang/ dran pa las rjes su dran pa'i las byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin las ci byed ce na/ ye shes kyi gnas sbyin pa'i las byed do//
32a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab las ci byed ce na/ spros pa rgyu ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ mthun pa la spyod pa'i las byed do/ /de la dus gsum rnam par gzhag pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ sa bon rnams kyi ni/ chos de las tha mi dad pas na/ 'bras bu byin ma
32a7(mdo 'grel): byin las chos de rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du de yang rnam par gzhag go /'bras bu rnams kyi ni 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa'o/ /rgyu yod pa ma byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma 'ongs pa'o/ /byung lam 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid ni da ltar byung ba'o/ /skye ba dang/
32b1(mdo 'grel): rga ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ mi rtag pa nyid ji ltar rnam par gzhag ce na/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyud thams cad la ni sa bon gyi rgyud thams cad lhan cig rgyu bar rnam par gzhag ste/ rkyen yod la/ rkyen yod pa'i dbang gis rgyud lnga na ma byung ba las/ dang po chos gang 'byung ba de ni
32b2(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid skye ba zhes bya'o/ /de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba ni rga ba'o/ /de la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ gzhan nyid du gzhan du 'gyur ba dang/ tha dad pas gzhan du 'gyur ba'o/ /de la 'dra bar 'byung ba ni gzhan nyid du gzhan du 'gyur pa'o/ /mi 'dra bar 'byung ba
32b3(mdo 'grel): ni tha dad par gzhan du 'gyur ba'o/ /skyes ma thag pa'i skye ba tsam gyi skad cig rjes su 'jug pa ni gnas pa'o/ /skye ba'i skad cig phan chad skad cig mi gnas pa ni mi rtag pa nyid de/ de dag kyang chos de nyid kyi dus kyi bye brag las mtshan nyid bzhir 'gyur ro/ /rkyen ni bzhi ste/ rgyu'i rkyen
32b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang/ dmigs pa'i rkyen dang/ bdag po'i rkyen dang/ de la sa bon gyi rgyu'i rkyen te/ mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni/ rnam par shes pa gang gi mjug thogs su rnam par shes pa gang dag 'byung bar nges pa de ni de dag gi mtshungs pa de ma
32b5(mdo 'grel): thag pa'i rkyen to/ /dmigs pa'i rkyen ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gang dag gi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o/ /bdag pa'i rkyen ni sa bon ma gtogs pa'i gnas gang yin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mig dang/ de'i grogs su gtogs pa'i chos gang
32b6(mdo 'grel): yin pa rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste/ 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir/ dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid gang yin pa dang/ de lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni bdag po'i rkyen to/ /de las sa bon las ni rgyu'i rkyen rnam par gzhag go /ngo bo
32b7(mdo 'grel): nyid las ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen rnam par gzhag go /dmigs pa las ni de nyid rnam par gzhag go /gnas dang grogs la sogs pa las ni bdag po'i rkyen rnam par gzhag go /rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang/ rkyen gang dag yin pa zhes gang bstan
33a1(mdo 'grel): pa de la/ bzhi po 'di dag nyid la rgyu'i rkyen gcig po ni/ rgyu yang yin la rkyen yang yin no/ /lhag ma rnams ni rkyen nyid do/ /dge ba dang mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes gang bstan pa la/ de dag gi rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/ dge ba ni rnam pa gcig
33a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ kho na ma tho ba med pa'i don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas thob pa dang/ sbyor ba las byung ba'o/ /rnam pa gsum ste/ ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa dang/ kun nas bslang ba'o/ /rnam pa bzhi ste/ bsod? nams? kyi cha dang mthun pa dang/ thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang/ nges par 'byed pa'i
33a3(mdo 'grel): cha dang 'thun pa dang/ zag pa med pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ sbyin pa las byung ba dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba dang/ sdug pa'i 'bras bu dang bral ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /dge ba rnam pa drug ste/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
33a4(mdo 'grel): byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'o/ /rnam pa bdun te dran pa nye bar gzhag par bsdus pa dang/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam gyi yan lag tu bsdus pa'o/
33a5(mdo 'grel): rnam pa brgyad de/ mngon par smra ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba'i las su bsdus pa dang/ legs par smras pa la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang/ bden pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bsdus pa dang/ nang g.yog bya bar bsdus pa dang/
33a6(mdo 'grel): bla ma rnams la gus par bsnyen bkur byed par bsdus pa dang/ rjes su yi rang bar bsdus pa dang/ gzhan yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bsdus pa dang/ yongs su bsngo bar bsdus pa dang/ tshad med par bsgom par bsdus pa'o/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ sbyor ba dang/ bar
33a7(mdo 'grel): chad med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ khyad par gyi lam du bsdus pa dang/ chung ngu dang 'bring dang/ chen po dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du bsdus pa'o/ /rnam pa bcu ste/ rdzas las byung ba dang/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dang/ thos pa
33b1(mdo 'grel): las byung ba dang/ bsam pa las byung ba dang/ sdom par bsdus pa dang/ sdom pa yang ma yin/ sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin par bsdus pa dang/ dngos gzhi dang nyer sdogs su bsdus pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg par bsdus pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsdus ba dang
33b2(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen por bsdus pa'o/ /yang rnam pa bcu ste/ 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang/ bsam gtan dang po dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang ldan pa dang/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched dang/ ci yang med pa'i
33b3(mdo 'grel): skye mched dang/ 'dus shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa dang/ zag pa med par bsdus pa'o/ /yang rnam pa bcu ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so/ /yang rnam pa bcu ste/ mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang
33b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa'i shes pa'i bar ro/ /yang rnam pa bcu ste/ bsod nams las skye ba brgyad dang/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang/ mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i ste/ de lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni dge ba'i rab tu dbye ba yin no/ /mdor
33b5(mdo 'grel): bsdu na ni dge ba'i don rnam pa gnyis te/ sdug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i don dang/ dngos po yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa de'i 'bras bu'i don to/ /mi dge ba de dag ni mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang/ dngos po yang dag par yongs su mi shes
33b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos la bgegs byed par 'gyur ba dang/ sgrib par gyur pa yin no/ /lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba dang/ de la spyod lam las byung ba kha cig dang/ bzo'i gnas las byung ba dang/ sbrul pa byed pa las
33b7(mdo 'grel): byung ba'o/ /bzo'i bag gang ci yang rung ste/ dga' ba dang rtse ba'i don du byed kyi/ 'tsho ba'i don du ma yin pa dang/ las kyi 'du shes kyis byed pa ma yin pa dang/ so sor brtags pas byed pa ma yin pa'i bzo'i gnas las byung ba de ni nyon mongs pa can no//
34a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /bzo'i gnas las byung ba ji lta bar sbyod lam las byung pa yang de bzhin no/ /sprul pa byed pa las byung ba ni dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /mig gi rnam pa gcig ste/ gzugs rnams la lta ba'o/ /rnam pa
34a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis te rgyas ba las byung ba dang/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o/ /rnam pa gsum ste/ sha'i mig dang lha'i mig dang/ shes rab kyi mig go/ rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'dzums ba dang/ mi 'dzums pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ brtan pa ma yin pa'o/ /de la brtan pa ni gzugs na spyod
34a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ 'gro ba lngar bsdus pa'o/ /rnam pa drug ste/ rang gi rgyud la yod pa dang/ gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa dang/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang/ dri ma can dang/ dri ma med pa'o/ /rnam pa bdun te/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa dang/
34a4(mdo 'grel): mthu dang ldan pa dang/ mthu chung ba dang/ dge ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten dang/ mi dge ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rten dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rten te/ /rnam pa brgyad ste/ gnas kyi mig dang/ sprul pa'i mig dang/ dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin
34a5(mdo 'grel): pa las byung ba dang/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba dang/ kha zas kyis rgyas par byas pa dang/ gnyid log pas rgyas par byas pa dang/ tshangs par spyad pas rgyas par byas pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug bas rgyas par byas pa'o/ /rnam pa dgu ste/
34a6(mdo 'grel): thob pa dang/ ma thob pa dang/ ston thob pa dang/ sngon ma thob pa dang/ /thob pa las nyams pa dang/ spang bar bya ba dang/ spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dang/ spangs pa dang/ ma spangs pa'o/ rnam pa bcu ni med do/ /rnam pa bcu gcig ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa
34a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ da ltar byung ba dang/ nang gi ni phyi rol gyi dang/ rags pa dang/ cha phra ba dang/ ngan pa dang/ bzang po dang/ ring po dang/ nye ba'o/ /rna ba la sogs pa nas/ lus kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra ba las rnam pa gsum dang/ rnam pa bzhi la ni bye brag yod de/ rna ba
34b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum ni/ shal grub pa dang/ lha'i dang/ rna blangs pa'o/ /rnam pa bzhi ni/ brtan pa dang/ brtan pa ma yin pa dang/ skad bskyed na thos pa dang/ skad ma bskyed par thos pa'o/ sna dang lce rnam pa gsum ni/ gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dang/ nyams pa'o/ /rna dang lce rnam
34b2(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi ni/ brtan pa dang/ brtan pa ma yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa'o/ /lus rnam pa gsum ni ro yod pa dang/ ro med pa dang/ dbang po thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir kun du 'gro ba'o/ /rnam pa bzhi ni brtan pa
34b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ brtan pa ma yin pa dang/ rang gi lus las 'od 'byung ba dang/ rang gi lus las 'od 'byung ba ma yin pa'o/ /yid ni rnam pa gcig ste/ chos rnam par shes pa'i don gyis so/ /rnam ba gnyis te/ gdags par gtogs pa dang/ gdags par gtogs pa ma yin
34b4(mdo 'grel): pas te/ de la dang po ni sher byed pa'i tha snyad can rnams kyi'o/ /phyi ma ni byis pa rnams kyi'o/ /rnam grangs gzhan yang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /rnam pa gsum ste/ sems dang yid dang/ rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam pa bzhi ste/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/
34b5(mdo 'grel): bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang/ ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga ni/ dus lnga'i bye brag las ni gyur te/ rgyu'i dus dang/ 'bras bu'i dus dang/ bde ba'i dus dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i dus dang/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin
34b6(mdo 'grel): bde ba yang ma yin pa'i dus so/ /rnam pa drug ste/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po rnams so/ /rnam pa bdun te/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun po rnams so/ rnam pa brgyad de tshig bla dgas kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa dang/ thog pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan ba
34b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ zhen pa la brten pa dang/ mngon par 'byung ba la brten pa dang/ zang zing dang bcas pa dang/ zang zing med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams so/ /rnam pa bcur ni med do/ /rnam pa
35a1(mdo 'grel): bcu gcig ste snga ma bzhin no/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis ni sems bcu gnyis te/ 'dod pa na sbyod pa dang/ dge ba dang mi dge ba dang/ bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang/ ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa rnam
35a2(mdo 'grel): pa gsum ste/ mi dge ba ma gtogs pa dang/ gzugs med ba na spyod pa yang de dang 'dra ba dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa slob dang mi slob pa'o/ /gzugs ni rnam pa gcig ste/ mig gi sbyod yul gyi don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi dang phyi rol gyi'o//
35a3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum ste/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ rnam par rig byed do/ /rnam pa bzhi ste/ rang gi rten snang bar byed pa dang/ rang gi rten snang bar byed pa ma yin pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bde ba ma yin par snang ba dang/ bsags par gnas pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ 'gro
35a4(mdo 'grel): ba lnga'i bye brag gis so/ /rnam pa drug ste/ bzhir bsdus pa dang/ gnas su bsdus pa dang/ yul du bsdus pa dang/ sems can du bgrang ba dang/ sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa dang/ bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'o/ /rnam pa bdun te/ yongs
35a5(mdo 'grel): su bzung ba rnam pa bdun pa drug gi bye brag gis so/ /rnam pa brgyad de/ 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs brgyad de/ de dag kyang sa phyogs sna tshogs dang/ ri sna tshogs dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ nags tshal dang/ mtsho dang/ mtshe'u la sogs pa sna tshogs dang/ khang khyam
35a6(mdo 'grel): dang gzhal med khang sna tshogs dang/ las kyi sna tshogs dang/ ri mo bra ba sna tshogs dang/ brdung sbyor gyi las sna tshogs dang/ yo byad sna tshogs so/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba dang/ rags pa dang/ cha phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/
35a7(mdo 'grel): bzang po 'am/ gang rgyang ring ba 'am/ gang thag nye ba'o/ /rnam pa bcu ste/ yo byad bcu bo rnams so/ /sgra ni rnam pa gcig ste/ rna ba'i spyod yul gyi don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te/ gsal ba'i don gyi sgra skad dang/ gsal ba ma yin pa'i don gyi sgra skad do/ /rnam pa
35b1(mdo 'grel): gsum ste/ zin pa'i byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba dang/ ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba dang/ de gnyi ga'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /rnam pa bzhi ste/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang/ ma bsgribs la/
35b2(mdo 'grel): lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ 'gro ba lnga'i bye bra gis so/ /rnam pa drug ste/ lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa'i sgra dang/ kun 'dri ba dang/ yongs su 'dri ba'i sgra dang/ chos 'chad pa'i sgra dang/ 'bal ba'i gtam dang/ rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa'i sgra dang/
35b3(mdo 'grel): gcig la gcig tshig gis 'debs shing nyes pa las 'byin pa'i sgra dang/ 'dres pa ca co'i sgra'o/ /rnam ba bdun te/ bud med kyi sgra dang/ skyes pa'i sgra dang/ chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po dang/ ri dags dang bya la sogs pa'i sgra dang/ rlung dang shing gi sgra'o//
35b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa brgyad de/ 'phags pa'i tha snyad bzhi bo'i sgra rnams dang/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad bzhi po'i sgra rnams te/ ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smra ba dang/ mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad dang/ mthos pa dang/ bye brag
35b5(mdo 'grel): ma byed pa dang/ rnam bar ma shes so zhes smra ba dang/ rnam par shes pa la rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad dang/ mthong ba la mthong zhes smra ba dang/ ma mthong ba la yang ma mthong zhes smra ba 'phags pa'i tha snyad dang/ thos pa dang/ bye brag phyed
35b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rnam par shes ba la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba dang/ rnam par ma shes pa la yang rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba 'phags pa'i tha snyad do/ /gzhan yang rnam pa brgyad de/ dag gis las kyi lam dge ba bzhi dang/ mi dge ba bzhi'o/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ 'das pa dang/
35b7(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba dang/ rgyang ring ba dang/ thag nye ba'i bar dag go/ rnam pa bcu ste/ sil snyan gyi rnam pa ldar bsdus pa ste/ de yang gar dang ldan pa dang/ glu dang ldan pa dang rol mo'i sgra dang ldan pa dang/ bud med dang ldan pa dang/ skyes po dang ldan pa dang/
36a1(mdo 'grel): dung gi sgra dang/ dam? Ta ha'i sgra dang/ rnga bo che'i sgra dang/ rdza rnga'i sgra dang/ skra bo che'i sgra dang/ dri ni rnam pa gcig ste/ sna'i spyod yul gyi don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te nang gi dang phyi rol gyi'o/ /rnam pa gsum ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba
36a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ btang snyoms kyi gnas so/ rnam pa bzhi ni /dri chen po rnam pa bzhi ste/ a ka ru'i dri dang/ du ru ka'i dri dang/ ga bur gyi dri dang/ gla rtsi'i? dri'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste rtsa ba'i dri dang/ snying po'i dri dang/ lo ma'i dri dang/ me tog gi dri dang/
36a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu'i dri'o/ /rnam pa drug ste/ zas kyi dri dang/ skom gyi dri dang/ gos kyi dri dang/ rgyan gyi dri dang/ bzhon pa'i dri dang/ gnas kyi dri'o/ /rnam pa bdun te/ shing rtsa'i dri dang/ spos lo'i dri dang/ sug smel gyi dri dang/ tsan dan gyi dri dang/ che ba gsum gyi dri dang/ bdug
36a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dri dang/ phye ma'i dri'o/ /rnam pa brgyad de/ lhan cig skyes pa dang/ lhan cig skyes pa ma yin pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ brtan pa ma yin pa dang/ sbyar ba dang/ 'ba' zhig pa dang/ dri che ba dang/ dri che ba ma yin pa'o/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma
36a5(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar 'byung ba nas/ rgyud ring ba dang/ thag nye ba'i bar dag go /rnam pa bcu ste/ skyes pa'i dri dang/ bud med kyi dri dang/ phyis sa'i dri dang/ gcin gyi dri dang/ dar? bsnabs kyi dri dang/ snabs kyi dri dang/ zhag dang/ chu ser gyi dri dang/ rnag dang/ khrag
36a6(mdo 'grel): gyi dri dang/ sha'i dri dang/ 'dres pa'i dri dang/ rul pa'i dri dang/ 'dam? rdzab kyi dri'o/ /ro ni rnam pa gcig ste/ lce'i spyod yul gyi don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te/ nang dang phyi rol gyi rol gyi'o/ /rnam pa gsum ste/ yid du 'ong ba nas snga ma bzhin no/ /rnam pa bzhi
36a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ nas kyi ro dang/ sA lu'i ro dang/ gro'i ro dang/ 'bru gzhan gyi ro'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ chang gi ro dang/ tshang ma yin pa'i ro dang/ sngo rdang? gyi ro dang/ nags tshal gyi shing tog gi ro dang/ kha zas kyi ro'o/ /rnam pa drug ste/ kha ba la sogs pa'o/ /rnam pa bdun
36b1(mdo 'grel): te/ mar dang/ 'bru? mar dang/ sprang rtsi dang/ bu ram shing las byung ba'i ro dang/ mngar? ba'i ro dang/ lan tshwa'i ro dang/ sha'i ro dang/ rnam pa brgyad de/ dri bzhin no/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ dri kho na bzhin no/ /rnam pa bcu ste/ bca' pa'i ro dang/ bza' ba'i ro dang/ myang ba'i ro dang/
36b2(mdo 'grel): btung ba'i ro dang/ bzhi pa ba'i ro dang/ sha 'bri bar byed pa dang/ sha rtas par byed pa dang/ zhi bar byed pa dang/ sbyong bar byed pa dang/ brten par bya ba'i sman gyi ro rnams so/ /reg bya ni rnam pa gcig ste/ lus kyi spyod yul gyi don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te dri bzhin no/ /
36b3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum ste/ yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'o/ /rnam pa bzhi ste/ reg par bya'i reg par bya ba dang/ bcir ba'i reg pa dang/ bsnun pa'i reg pa dang/ ma nye ba'i reg pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ 'gro ba lnga'i bye brag gis so/ /gzhan yang sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu mchu
36b4(mdo 'grel): rings dang/ rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ sdig sbrul gyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rnam pa drug ste/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ sdug bsngal pa yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa dang/ lhan cig skyes pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs su bsdus pa dang/ gnyen por bsdus
36b5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /rnam ba bdun te/ sra ba dang/ gsher ba dang/ dro ba dang/ g.yo ba dang/ mtshong? pa dang/ lhung ba'i 'dus te reg ba dang/ gyu gnom gyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus 'gyur gyi 'dus te reg pa ste/ 'jam pa la sogs pa rnams la'o/ /rnam pa brgyad de/ lag pa'i
36b6(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa dang/ bod pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ 'byug ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ mtshon cha'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ grang ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ bkres pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ skom pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ tsha ba'i 'dus te reg ba'o/ /rnam
36b7(mdo 'grel): pa dgu ste dri bzhin no/ /rnam pa bcu ste/ /'bras kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ skom pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ bzhon pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ gos kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rgyan gyi dus te reg pa dang/ khri dang khri'u'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ stan nang tshangs can dang/ la 
37a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i bstan dang/ sngas nad tshangs can dang/ gor bu'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ bud med kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ skyes pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ de gnyis dga' mgur spyod cing yongs su spyod pa'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /chos kyi khams ni mdor
37a2(mdo 'grel): bsdu na/ gdags pa'i chos rnams dang bcas par chos brgyad cu rtsa bdun yod de/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ yid la byed pa la sogs pa nas rtog pa dang dpyod pa la thug pa yan chad sems las byung ba lnga bcu rtsa gsum dang/ chos kyi skye mched du gtogs
37a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ sdom pa dang/ sdom pa ma yin par bsdus pa'i gzugs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs dang/ thob pa dang/ 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ srog gi dbang po dang/
37a4(mdo 'grel): ris mthun pa dang/ so so'i skye bo nyid dang/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ ming gi tshogs rnams dang/ tshig gi tshogs rnams dang/ yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang/ 'jug pa dang/ so sor nges pa dang/ 'byor 'brel dang/ mgyogs pa dang
37a5(mdo 'grel): go rim dang/ dus dang/ yul dang/ grangs dang/ tshogs pa dang/ tshogs pa ma yin pa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi dngos po brgyad de/ nam mkha' dang/ so sor brtogs pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dang/ so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma
37a6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ tshor ba 'gog pa'o/ /de dag ni brgyad kyang drug tu 'gyur ro/ /drug las kyang brgyad du 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi khams de yang rnam pa gcig ste/ yid kyi spyod yul gyi don gyis so/ /rnam pa gnyis te/
37a7(mdo 'grel): gdags pa'i chos su bsdus pa dang/ gdags pa ma yin pa'i chos su bsdus pa'o/ /rnam pa gsum ste/ gzugs can dang/ gzugs can ma yin pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas so/ /rnam pa bzhi ste/ gzugs can gdags pa'i chos su bsdus pa dang/
37b1(mdo 'grel): gzugs can ma yin pa sems las byung ba'i chos su bsdus pa dang/ gzugs can ma yin pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa gdags pa'i chos su bsdus pa dang/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'dus ma byas par gdags pa'i chos su bsdus pa'o/ /rnam pa lnga ste/ gzugs dang sems las
37b2(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i chos rnams dang/ sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams dang/ 'dus ma byas dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam pa drug ste/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams las mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang/ ldan pa ma yin pa rnams dang/ gzugs dang 'dus
37b3(mdo 'grel): ma byas so/ /rnam pa bdun te/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ sems pa dang/ nyon mongs pa can dang/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang/ gzugs dang 'dus ma byas so/ /rnam pa brgyad ste/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
37b4(mdo 'grel): byed rnams dang/ gzugs dang/ 'du ma byas rnams so/ /rnam pa dgu ste/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so/ /rnam pa bcu ni/ rnam pa bcu'i phyir te/ rjes su 'brel ba'i skye bo'i don dang/ dmigs pa myong ba'i don dang/ dmigs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin
37b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i don dang/ dmigs pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i don dang/ chos de dag nyid dus tha dad pa'i don dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i don dang/ mi rtag pa dang/ bral ba'i don dang/ mi rtag pa dang ma bral ba'i don dang/ rtag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i
37b6(mdo 'grel): don dang/ tshor ba dang/ bral ba ma yin pa'i don dang/ tshor ba dang bral ba'i don dang/ nang dang phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba dag ni/ drug brgya drug cu yod do/ /de la zad par ma gyur gyi bar du gzugs rnams la blta ba'i phyir/ spyod cing zad par ma gyur gyi bar du
37b7(mdo 'grel): gzugs rnams la blta ba'i phyir spyod pas na mig go /'di la grags rnams dmigs shing/ 'di la grags pa rnams dmigs pas na rna ba'o/ /dri rnams snom zhing dri rnams snom pas na sna'o/ bkres pa'i nyam chung ba sel ba dang/ brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs la 'dris pas
38a1(mdo 'grel): 'bod par byed pas na lce'o/ /lus 'di ni dbang po byed par gyi rjes su song bas na lus so/ /yun ring po nas 'di byis pa rnams kyis bcos shing bsrungs la bdag gir bzung ste/ 'di ni bdag gis so/ /'di ni bdag gis bdag yin no snyam nas/ de la 'jig
38a2(mdo 'grel): rten gyi ming/ sems can dang mi dang srog dang skye ba po dang/ oshed las skyes pa dang/ shed pu zhes bya bas na yid do/ /yul dang der brtag par byang rung ba dang/ yul de dang der gnod par byar rung zhing/ skye bas de'i phyir gzugs zhes bya'o/ /brjod bzhin du 'jigs pas na sgra'o/ 'di
38a3(mdo 'grel): la smra ba sna tshogs gnas pas de'i phyir sgra zhes bya'o/ /rdzi phyogs su 'gro zhing rgyugs pas de'i phyir dri'o/ /nad rnams sdud pa dang/ myang bar bya ba yin pas de'i phyir ro'o/ /lus kyis reg par bya zhing/ lus kyi reg par bya ba'i phyir reg bya'o/ /yid kyi yul 'ba' zhig tu 'dzin cing/
38a4(mdo 'grel): yid kyi yul 'ba' zhig tu 'dzin pas na chos rnams te/ de lta bu dang 'thun pa rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba yin par blta bar bya'o/ /de la sdom ni/ ngo bo nyid dang gnas dang ni/ /dmigs pa dang ni grogs rnams dang/ /las te sgo ni lnga po yis/ /sems ni rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/
38a5(mdo 'grel): de la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi chos lnga'o/ /ngo bo nyid dang gnas dang dmigs pa dang/ grogs dang las 'di dag gis ni phung po la mkhas pa yang bsdus par rig par bya'o/ /khams la mkhas pa dang/ skye mched la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
38a6(mdo 'grel): la mkhas pa dang/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang/ dbang po la mkhas par yang bsdus par rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bka' yi dngos po dgu yang bsdus par rig par bya'o/ /dngos po dgu gang zhe na/ sems can gyi dngos po dang/ longs spyod kyi dngos po
38a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ skye ba'i dngos po dang/ gnas pa'i dngos po dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i dngos po dang/ sna tshogs kyi dngos po dang/ ston pa po'i dngos po dang/ bstan par bya ba'i dngos po dang/ 'khor gyi dngos po'o/ /de la sems can gyi dngos po ni/ nye bar len
38b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phung po lnga po rnams so/ /de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po ni skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams so/ /skye pa'i dngos po ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o/ /skyes pa'i gnas pa'i dngos po ni zas bzhi po rnams so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i dngos po ni 'phags
38b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams so/ /sna tshogs kyi dngos po ni/ khams tshad med pa rnams so ston pa po'i dngos po ni/ sangs rgyas rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos rnams so/ /bstan par bya ba'i dngos po ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /'khor gyi
38b3(mdo 'grel): dngos po ni brgyad de/ rgyal rigs kyi 'khor dang/ bram ze'i 'khor dang/ khyim bdag gi 'khor dang/ dge sbyong gi 'khor dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor dang/ bdud ris kyi 'khor dang/ tshangs pa'i 'khor to/ /sdom ni/ 'dus pa dang/ ni tshogs
38b4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ /dus dang mtshan nyid rkyen rnams dang/ /dge ba la sogs rab dbye? dang/ /mkhas pa dngos po tha ma yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las yid kyis ste gnyis pa rdzogs so/ //bam po bzhi pa/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa ni gang/ rtog pa med
38b5(mdo 'grel): pa la dpyod pa tsam gyis ni gang/ rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa ni gang zhe na/ spyi sdom la/ khams dang mtshan nyid tshul bzhin dang/ /tshul min nyon mongs tha ma yin/ sa gsum po 'di dag ni/ khams gdags pa rnam par bzhag pa dang/ mtshan nyid
38b6(mdo 'grel): gdags pa rnam par bzhag pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa gdags pa rnam par bzhag pa dang/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags pa rnam par bzhag pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa gdags pa rnam par bzhag pas rnam par bzhag par rig par bya'o/ /sdom la grangs
38b7(mdo 'grel): dang gnas dang tshad rnams dang/ tshe yi tshad dang longs spyod dang/ /skye ba dang ni lus rnams dang/ /rgyu dang rkyen rnams rgya cher ro/ /khams gdags pa rnam par gdags pa gang zhe na/ de ni rnam pa brgyad du rig par bya ste/ grangs rnam par bzhag pa dang/ /gnas gzhan
39a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par bzhag pa dang/ sems can gyi tshad rnam par bzhag pa dang/ sems can de dag nyid kyi tshe'i tshad rnam par bzhag pa dang/ sems can de dag nyid kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa rnam par bzhag pa dang/ skye ba rnam par bzhag pa
39a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ lus rnam par bzhag pa dang/ rgyu dang rkyen rnam par bzhag pa'o/ /de la grangs rnam par bzhag pa ni/ 'di yin no/ /khams ni gsum ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams te/ khams 'di dag ni ma gtogs pa yin no/ /thabs dang
39a3(mdo 'grel): bcas pas 'jig tshogs 'gog pa/ zag pa med pa'i khams spros pa med pa ni ma gtogs pa yin no/ /de la 'dod pa'i khams mdza' dag dang/ gzugs kyi khams na bsam gtan dang po las/ bsam gtan khyad par can snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ skye ba dang bcas
39a4(mdo 'grel): pa ma gtogs pa ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa'o/ /bsam gtan khyad par can snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ skye ba dang bcas pa ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ste/ 'ga' zhig gis de bsgoms na tshangs pa chen po nyid 'thob bo/ /bsam gtan
39a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa nas gzung ste/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lhag ma rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams mdza' dag ni rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa'o/ /de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyis rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i
39a6(mdo 'grel): sa zhes bya'o/ kun tu dpyod pa med pas ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa rnams kyang/ man ngag yid la byed pa'i khyad par gyis yid kyi rgyu ba res 'ga' rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med par yang 'gyur la/ rtog pa dang dpyod
39a7(mdo 'grel): pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rtog pa dang dpyod pa kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ der skyes pa rnams dang langs pa rnams la'o/ /de la zag pa med pa'i khams ni/ 'dus byas gang snyoms par 'jug pas bsdus pa'o/ /de la yang bsam
39b1(mdo 'grel): gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa sa yin te/ rtog pa dpyod pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas/ de la snyoms par 'jug gi /rtog pa rgyu bas ni ma yin te/ lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de la gnas gzhan
39b2(mdo 'grel): rnam par bzhag pa ni 'di yin no/ /'dod pa'i khams ni gnas gzhan sum cu rtsa drug po rnams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas brgyad la 'di lta ste/ yang sos dang thig nag dang/ sdus 'joms dang/ ngu 'bod dang/ ngu 'bod chen po dang/ tsha ba dang/ rab tu
39b3(mdo 'grel): tsha ba dang/ mnar med pa'o/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag gi thad ka dpag tshad khri'i pha rol na/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i gnas brgyad yod pa la 'di lta ste/ chu bur can dang/ chu bur rdol pa dang/ so thams thams pa dang/ kyi hud zer ba dang/
39b4(mdo 'grel): a cu zer ba dang/ utpa la ltar gas pa dang/ pad+ma ltar gas pa dang/ pad+ma ltar gas pa chen po'o/ /yang sos ni 'di nas dpag tshad sum khri nyis stong gi 'og na yod do/ /de'i 'og na dpag tshad bzhi stong bzhi stong gis bcal ba na ni de las gzhan pa rnams yod do//
39b5(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i gnas dang po yang de dang 'dra'o/ /de'i 'og tu dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong gis bcad pa na ni de las gzhan pa rnams yod pa blta bar bya'o/ /yi dwags kyi gnas
39b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan dang/ lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan dang/ dud 'gro ni lha dang mi dang lhan cig rgyu ba nyid yin pas de'i phyir de dag gi gnas gzhan logs shig tu rnam par mi bzhag go /gling bzhi dang/ gling phran brgyad ni snga ma bzhin no/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnam pa drug
39b7(mdo 'grel): la/ rgyal chen bzhi'i dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so/ /bdud kyi gnas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi nang du gtogs pa'i gnas gzhan khyad par can yin no//
40a1(mdo 'grel): nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dang/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i nye 'khor nyid de/ gnas gzhan bye brag can med do/ /nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal
40a2(mdo 'grel): ba de dag kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang na yang dmigs te/ gnas brtan maung+gal gyi bus ji skad du/ ngas sems can 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /gnas
40a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan sum cu rtsa drug po 'di dag ni 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya'o/ /gzugs kyi khams ni gnas gzhan bco brgyad de/ bsam gtan dang po chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen por yongs su bsgoms pas tshangs ris rnams dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang/
40a4(mdo 'grel): tshangs pa chen po rnams so/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen por yongs su bsgom pas/ 'od chung rnams dang/ tshad med 'od rnams dang/ 'od gsal rnams so/ /bsam gtan gsum pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang chen po yongs su bsgoms pas/
40a5(mdo 'grel): dge chung rnams dang/ tshad med dge rnams dang/ dge rgyas rnams so/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen por yongs su bsgoms pas/ sprin med pa rnams dang/ bsod nams skyes rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams so/ /'du shes med pa ni 'bras
40a6(mdo 'grel): bu che ba'i nang du gtogs la/ 'phags pa rnams dang/ thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir gnas gzhan med do/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa spel mar bsgoms pas/ chung ngu dang 'bring dang/ chen po dang/ ches che ba dang/ mchog tu che bar yongs su bsgoms pas/ gnas
40a7(mdo 'grel): gtsang ma'i sa lnga po mi che ba rnams dang/ mi gdung pa rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba rnams dang/ shin tu mthong rnams dang/ 'og min rnams so/ /gnas gtsang ma rnams las 'das pa na dbang phyug chen po'i gnas yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas
40b1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyis sa bcu yongs su bsgoms nas gang du skye ba'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas gnas gzhan bzhi po rnams so/ /yang na gnas gzhan ci yang med pa yang yin no/ /de la sems can gyi tshad rnam par bzhag pa ni 'di yin te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi lus kyi
40b2(mdo 'grel): tshad ni nges pa med de/ res 'ga' ni chen por 'gyur ro/ /res 'ga' ni chung ngur 'gyur te/ de yang rang gi khru chad phyed dang bzhi'o/ /shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni des pa yin te/ de dag kyang rang gi khru tshad phyed dang bzhi pa ste/ lus shin tu che'o/ /shar
40b3(mdo 'grel): gyi lus 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu che'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshad ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshad ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig pas
40b4(mdo 'grel): lhag go /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do/ /'thab bral ba rnams kyang rgyang grags phyed do/ /de yan chad de las gzhan pa'i lha'i ris thams cad ni bzhi cha re re lhag par blta bar bya'o/ /tshangs ris pa rnams kyi dpag tshad phyed do/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na
40b5(mdo 'grel): 'don pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gcig go /tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis so/ /'od chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so/ /de yan chad de'i lhag ma ris rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni de'i nyis 'gyur de'i nyis 'gyur du blta bar bya'o/ /sprin med pa rnams
40b6(mdo 'grel): kyi ni ma gtogs te/ de la ni dpag tshad gsum dbri bar bya'o/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi tshad ni nges pa mang ngo/ /gang gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las shin tu drag po byas shing bsags pa de'i lus ni ches che bar 'grub par 'gyur la gzhan dag gi ni gzhan
40b7(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /lha ma yin
41a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi lus ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i tshad bzhin du rnam par bzhag par rig par bya'o/ /gzugs med pa dag gi ni/ gzugs med pa'i phyir tshad med do/ /de la tshe'i tshad rnam par bzhag pa ni 'di yin te/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi ni zhag sum cu
41a2(mdo 'grel): la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig gi tshul gyis tshe'i tshad nges pa med de/ res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /res 'ga' ni tshe lo brgyad khri par 'gyur ro/ /res 'ga' ni tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /shar lus 'phags pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad nges
41a3(mdo 'grel): pa yin te/ lo nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/ /nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga brgya'o/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo/ /mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /de lta bu'i nyin
41a4(mdo 'grel): zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lor brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya thub po/ /mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig ga /de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig ste/ snga ma bzhin
41a5(mdo 'grel): du che lo stong thub bo/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha'i ris gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bar du/ lha de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni nyin zhag kyang de'i nyis 'gyur la/ tshe'i tshad kyang de'i nyis 'gyur ba yin no/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi tshe'i tshad rangs po ni/ sems
41a6(mdo 'grel): can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go /de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ tshe'i tshad sems can dmyal ba pa'i lo lnga brgya thub po/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i tshe tshad kyis/ /sems can dmyal
41a7(mdo 'grel): ba chen po yang sos su skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre ba de bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi che'i chad kyis thig nag tu skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o/ /'thab bral ba rnams kyis tshe'i tshad kyis sdus 'joms su skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o//
41b1(mdo 'grel): dga' ldan rnams kyi che'i tshad kyi ngu 'bod du skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o/ /'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyis ngu 'bod chen por skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyis tsha bar skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre bar rig
41b2(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /rab tu tsha bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i chad ni bar gyi bskal pa'i bskal pa phyed do/ /mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa'i bskal pa gcig go /lha ma yin rnams kyi ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'dra'o/ /dud 'gro
41b3(mdo 'grel): dang yi dags rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni nges pa med do/ /grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams las phyi ma phyi ma phyed phyed zhugs par rig par bya'o/ /nye 'khor gyi sems
41b4(mdo 'grel): can dmyal ba dang/ nyi tsha ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tsha'i tshad ni nges pa med do/ /tshangs ris pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go/ tshangs pa'i na dun
41b5(mdo 'grel): na 'don pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal ba gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go /tshangs chen pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug cu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go /'od chung
41b6(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu la bskal par bgrang ba'i bskal pa gnyis so/ /de yan chad de las gzhan pa'i gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu po de'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur ro/ /sprin
41b7(mdo 'grel): med pa ni ma gtogs te/ de la bskal pa gsum dbri bar bya'o/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa nyi khri'o/ /rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bzhi
42a1(mdo 'grel): khri'o/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched du skyes ba rnams kyi ni drug khri'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri'o/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par de las gzhan pa rnams la ni bar ma dor
42a2(mdo 'grel): 'chi ba yod do/ /de la mi rnams dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dags rnams kyi lus ni rer 'gyur te 'dug go /lha rnams dang sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni rnam par shes pa dang mgo mnyam du mi snang bar 'gyur te/ lus ror gyur te 'dug pa med do/ /de la longs
42a3(mdo 'grel): spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong ba dang/ kha zas kyi longs spyod dang/ 'khrig pa'i longs spyod do/ /de la sems can dmyal ba dag ni na/ sems gnod pa'i sdug bsngal shes cher nyams
42a4(mdo 'grel): su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro rnabs gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ yi dags rnams ni bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang mi rnams ni tshol khros nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ lha rnams ni 'chi 'pho ba dang/ ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su
42a5(mdo 'grel): myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can dmyal ba chan po yang sems can ni/ gnod pa'i sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu shas tshar nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ de sems can de dag phan tshun 'dus nas las kyi dbang gis byung ba'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs rims kyis 'byung
42a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis/ gcig la gcig bsnun par byed de/ brgyal nas sa la 'gyel lo/ /de nas nam mkha' la sems can ma khyed rnams kyang sos par gyur cig ces sgra 'byung ngo/ /de nas yang sems can de dag langs te/ de lta bu'i tshul du gcig la gcig bsnun par byed do//
42a7(mdo 'grel): gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste/ de bas na sems can dmyal ba de yang sos zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag
42b1(mdo 'grel): na ni gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ de na sems can de dag der gang gis pa'i mi gnod par byed pa dag gis thing nag pos btsal te/ zur bzhi'i/ zur brgyad dam/ char? gseb rnam pa sna tshogs du mar gzhal bar byed do/ /gzhal nas kyang de lta de
42b2(mdo 'grel): lta bur bsheg cing 'jog pa kun tu rab tu 'jog go /gzhi 'di las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste/ de bas na sems can dmyal ba de
42b3(mdo 'grel): thig nag ces bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus ga chom na ni/ gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ de na sems can de dag 'chi phan tshun nas gcig tu 'dus shing tshogs par gur pa de'i tshe/ der gtogs
42b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mi gnod par byed pa rnams kyis ra'i gdong lta bu'i lcags kyi ri chen po gnyis kyi bar du 'chang bar byed de/ tshangs ma thag tu ri de gnyis kyis btsir ro/ /de dag btsir nas sgo thams cad cu? brag gi klung 'bab cing reg tu 'bab po/ /ra'i gdong lta bu gnyis
42b5(mdo 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du/ lug gi gdong lta bu gnyis dang/ rta'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang/ glang po che'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang/ seng ge'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang/ stag gi gdong lta bu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /yang 'dus par gyur nas lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor
42b6(mdo 'grel): chen po'i nang du bcug nas/ dper na bu ram shing brdungs pa la bya ba bzhin du btsir bar byed do/ /de dag der btsir ban khrag gi rlung 'bab cing rab tu 'bab bo/ /yang pa 'dus par gyur nas/ steng nas lcags kyi pha bong chen po ltung bar 'gyur te/ des sems can de dag
42b7(mdo 'grel): lags kyis gzhi la kun tu gcod cing/ kun tu 'byed la/ kun tu brdung zhing kun tu dmyal bar byed do/ /de dag der kun tu gcod cing kun tu 'byed la/ kun tu brdul zhing kun tu dmyal ba na khrag gi klung 'bab cing rab tu 'bab bo/ /gzhi de las yun ring por
43a1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste/ de bas na sems can dmyal ba de bsdus gzhom zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba chen po du
43a2(mdo 'grel): 'bod na ni/ gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur to/ de ni sems can de dag nas tshol zhing lcags kyi khang pa'i nang du 'jug par byed do/ /de dag der zhugs nas mi btang ste/ nges de dag kun du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu
43a3(mdo 'grel): mched nas bsreg par 'gyur ro/ /de dag don du zhing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin to/ /gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myol bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang ba'i bar du ste/ de bas
43a4(mdo 'grel): na sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod ces bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po na ni bye brag tu ngu 'bod kyi skabs su khang pa bstan pa gang yin pa de/ de na yang khang pa nyid yod pa las khang pa sbrum du 'jug par rig par bya ste/ de bas na
43a5(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal ba de ngu 'bod chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba na ni/ gnang ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cheng nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ sems can de dag der gtogs pa'i mi gnod par byed pa rnams kyis lcags zangs dpag tshad
43a6(mdo 'grel): du ma yod pa/ tsha zhing kun du tsha la kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba'i nang du bcug nas bskol zhing yongs su bskol te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nya bzhin du bsreg cing rab tu bsreg go /gzhan yang lcags kyi gsal shing kun du 'bar zhing/ rab tu 'bar la mes yar phug
43a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ gsal shing de yang rkub tu zhugs nas spyi bor 'byung ngo/ /sems can de dag gi kha dang/ mig gi 'bras bu gnyis dang/ sna'i bu gu gnyis dang/ rna ba'i bu gu gnyis dang/ spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang/ me lce 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang
43b1(mdo 'grel): lcags kyi sa gzhi tsha zhing rab tu tshal kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba la/ gan rgyal lam kha bub tu gzhag ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sha'i snag bu la bya ba bzhin du/ lcags kyi tho ba tsha zhing kun tu rab tu 'bar ba dag gis rdung zhing kun tu brdung la
